name: Scrapped (DarrinC, Untitled Eva)
description:
It's time to get back to work! Days are busy as your robot self. No time to rest as you head out into the world to serve your alien overlords. 

This planet is filth! Luckily there's plenty of resources to be found within all the rubbage  on the once prosperous planet. The bad news? It's your job to pick it all up.

Make sure you stay alive out there. Company policy doesn't have anything for your damages and to be honest, they don't care about you that much.
